features.title: Seamless Voice Channel Integration
features.description: Easily connect the bot to your Discord voice channel with a simple command to start playing music.

features.title: Versatile Music Playback
features.description: Play music by searching for song titles, artists, or directly from YouTube URLs.

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Add songs to a queue, view the current queue, rearrange the playlist, and skip to any song.

features.title: Playlist Support
features.description: Queue and play songs from YouTube playlists seamlessly with a single command (Premium Feature).

features.title: Playback Controls
features.description: Control your music with easy-to-use commands directly in Discord, including play, pause, skip, and stop.

features.title: Premium Play Now Feature
features.description: Stop current playback and queue the next requested song immediately by using `playnow` command (Premium Feature).

features.title: High Quality Audio
features.description: Enjoy crystal-clear music streaming directly to your Discord server with no compromise in quality (Premium Feature).

features.title: Repeat Functionality
features.description: Repeat the currently playing song in loop (Premium Feature).

features.title: Volume Control
features.description: Control the volume level of the music playback (Premium Feature).

features.title: 24/7 Uptime
features.description: Spoty bot ensures the bot is always online to play your favorite music.

features.title: Cross-Platform Compatibility
features.description: Spoty is compatible with various platforms including YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud etc.

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: The bot has an intuitive and easy-to-understand interface for all users.

features.title: Auto-Disconnection
features.description: The bot disconnects from the voice channel when it becomes the only member in the channel.
